item.description:
Tim Gearan is a legend in the Cambridge music scene. In addition to being a great singer/songwriter, he's also one hell of a guitarist.

One reviewer had this to say:

"Gearan has a deep, drawling voice that quickly wins you over. His ragtime cover of "Sittin' on Top of the World" and James Taylor's "Lo and Behold" are further highlights, though most of his tunes are original and testify to his hard-gigging talent. He also plays Fridays at Atwood's Tavern in Cambridge in a more stripped-down setting."

His friday shows at Atwood's are really something.

Come on out for some seriously good music.
item.name: Tim Gearan Band at Atwood's Tavern
